casebody.data:
QUALITY BUILT HOMES INCORPORATED, et al.
v.
TOWN OF CARTHAGE 315PA15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 6, 2017 James E. Scarbrough, Attorney at Law, James R. DeMay, Attorney at Law, Concord, John F. Scarborough, Attorney at Law, for Quality Built Homes Incorporated, et al. Susan K. Burkhart, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Town of Carthage. Stephen D. Feldman, Attorney at Law, Paul M. Cox, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Steven A. Scoggan, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, F. Paul Calamita, III, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Water Quality Association and Seven Municipalities.

M. C. Hackney Assistant Clerk, Supreme Court Of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 6th of July 2017 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of July 2017."

Plaintiffs shall have up to and including the 7th day of August 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
